00008 #include <QtGui>
00009 
00010 #include "imgLabel.h"
00011 #include "qcorr.h"
00012 
00013 ImgLabel::ImgLabel(Qcorr *parentWindow, QWidget *parent) :
00014    QLabel(parent)
00015 {
00016    m_parentWindow = parentWindow; // Point to the Qcorr MainWindow
00017 
00018    m_rubberBand = new QRubberBand(QRubberBand::Rectangle, this);
00019    m_rubberBand->setCursor(Qt::SizeAllCursor);
00020    m_rubberBand->setMouseTracking(true);
00021 
00022    m_bStartedTemplateSelection = false;
00023    m_bMouseIsPressed = false;
00024 
00025    setTemplateFlags(false);
00026 
00027    m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint = QPoint(0,0);
00028    // m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint must be RESET from the parent (since the label size can dynamically change)
00029 //   m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint = QPoint(this->width(), this->height());
00030 
00031 }

00033 ImgLabel::~ImgLabel()
00034 {
00035    // TODO Auto-generated destructor stub
00036 }
00037 
00038 void
00039 ImgLabel::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00040 {
00041    m_bMouseIsPressed = true;
00042 
00043    m_currentPressedPoint = event->pos();
00044    m_mousePosPoint1.setX(-1); // Reset the flag used to know when the mouse is being dragged around
00045 
00046 
00047    if (m_rubberBand->isHidden() && (m_bStartedTemplateSelection == false))
00048       {
00049          m_originPoint = event->pos();
00050          m_rubberBand->setGeometry(QRect(m_originPoint, QSize()));
00051       }
00052    else
00053       {
00054          this->setCursor(Qt::CrossCursor);
00055          m_rubberBand->hide();
00056       }
00057 
00058    update();
00059 }
00060 
00061 void
00062 ImgLabel::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00063 {
00064    if (m_bMouseIsPressed)
00065       {
00066          m_rubberBand->show();
00067 
00068          m_bStartedTemplateSelection = true;
00069 
00070          QPoint newOriginPoint = QPoint(0,0);
00071 
00072          if(m_bMouseInTemplateRegion)
00073             {
00074 
00075             if(m_mousePosPoint1.x() < 0)
00076                {
00077                   m_mousePosPoint1 = event->pos(); // Sets to the position of the mouse position when it's dragged for the first time
00078                }
00079             else
00080                {
00081                m_mousePosPoint2 = event->pos();
00082 
00083                QPoint offsetPoint = m_mousePosPoint1 - m_mousePosPoint2;
00084 
00085                newOriginPoint = m_originPoint - offsetPoint; //m_currentPressedPoint - (m_finalPoint - event->pos());
00086 
00087                QPoint movedFinalPoint;
00088 
00089                movedFinalPoint.setX(newOriginPoint.x() + m_rubberBand->width());
00090                movedFinalPoint.setY(newOriginPoint.y() + m_rubberBand->height());
00091 
00092                // Validate new template's position to be within the label's margins
00093                if((newOriginPoint.x() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.x())
00094                      && (movedFinalPoint.x() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.x())
00095                      )
00096                   {
00097                      m_nXNewPos = newOriginPoint.x();
00098                   }
00099                if((newOriginPoint.y() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.y())
00100                      && (movedFinalPoint.y() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.y())
00101                      )
00102                   {
00103                      m_nYNewPos = newOriginPoint.y();
00104                   }
00105 
00106                   newOriginPoint.setX(m_nXNewPos);
00107                   newOriginPoint.setY(m_nYNewPos);
00108                   m_rubberBand->move(newOriginPoint);
00109                   displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(newOriginPoint, movedFinalPoint);
00110 
00111                }
00112             }
00113          else if(m_bMouseAtTemplateTopEdge)
00114             {
00115             newOriginPoint = QPoint(m_originPoint.x(), event->pos().y());
00116 
00117             // Validate new template's size to be within the label's margins
00118             if((newOriginPoint.y() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.y())
00119                    && (newOriginPoint.y() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.y())
00120                    )
00121                {
00122                m_rubberBand->setGeometry(QRect(newOriginPoint, m_finalPoint).normalized());
00123                displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(newOriginPoint, m_finalPoint);
00124                }
00125             }
00126          else if(m_bMouseAtTemplateBottomEdge)
00127             {
00128             newOriginPoint = QPoint(m_finalPoint.x(), event->pos().y());
00129 
00130             // Validate new template's size to be within the label's margins
00131             if((newOriginPoint.y() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.y())
00132                    && (newOriginPoint.y() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.y())
00133                    )
00134                {
00135                m_rubberBand->setGeometry(QRect(m_originPoint, newOriginPoint).normalized());
00136                displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(m_originPoint, newOriginPoint);
00137                }
00138             }
00139          else if(m_bMouseAtTemplateLeftEdge)
00140             {
00141             newOriginPoint = QPoint(event->pos().x(), m_originPoint.y());
00142 
00143             // Validate new template's size to be within the label's margins
00144             if((newOriginPoint.x() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.x())
00145                   && (newOriginPoint.x() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.x())
00146                   )
00147                {
00148                m_rubberBand->setGeometry(QRect(newOriginPoint, m_finalPoint).normalized());
00149                displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(newOriginPoint, m_finalPoint);
00150                }
00151             }
00152          else if(m_bMouseAtTemplateRightEdge)
00153             {
00154             newOriginPoint = QPoint(event->pos().x(), m_finalPoint.y());
00155 
00156             // Validate new template's size to be within the label's margins
00157             if((newOriginPoint.x() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.x())
00158                   && (newOriginPoint.x() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.x())
00159                   )
00160                {
00161                m_rubberBand->setGeometry(QRect(m_originPoint, newOriginPoint).normalized());
00162                displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(m_originPoint, newOriginPoint);
00163                }
00164             }
00165          else
00166             { // Making a selection with the rubber band
00167             // Validate rubber-band selection to be within the label's margins
00168               if((event->pos().x() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.x())
00169                     && (event->pos().x() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.x())
00170                     )
00171                  {
00172                     m_nXNewPos = event->pos().x();
00173                  }
00174               if((event->pos().y() >= m_labelUpperLeftCornerPoint.y())
00175                     && (event->pos().y() <= m_labelLowerRightCornerPoint.y())
00176                     )
00177                  {
00178                     m_nYNewPos = event->pos().y();
00179                  }
00180 
00181    //            m_finalPoint = event->pos();
00182                m_finalPoint.setX(m_nXNewPos);
00183                m_finalPoint.setY(m_nYNewPos);
00184 
00185 
00186                m_rubberBand->setGeometry(
00187                               QRect(m_currentPressedPoint, m_finalPoint).normalized());
00188                setTemplateFlags(false);
00189                displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(m_currentPressedPoint, m_finalPoint);
00190                }
00191       }
00192    else
00193       {
00194          if(m_rubberBand->isVisible())
00195          {
00196          checkTemplateRegions(event->pos().x(), event->pos().y());
00197          }
00198          else
00199          {
00200             m_bStartedTemplateSelection = false;
00201             m_currentPressedPoint = event->pos();
00202             displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(m_currentPressedPoint, m_currentPressedPoint); // Show mouse moving position only
00203             setTemplateFlags(false);
00204          }
00205       }
00206 }
00207 
00208 void
00209 ImgLabel::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00210 {
00211    m_bMouseIsPressed = false;
00212    m_bStartedTemplateSelection = false;
00213 
00214    if (m_rubberBand->isVisible())
00215       {
00216       // Obtain actual origin and final Points
00217       m_originPoint = m_rubberBand->pos(); // Set new position of the Points
00218       m_finalPoint.setX(m_originPoint.x() + m_rubberBand->width());
00219       m_finalPoint.setY(m_originPoint.y() + m_rubberBand->height());
00220 
00221       checkTemplateRegions(event->pos().x(), event->pos().y());
00222       }
00223 }
00224 
00225 void ImgLabel::setTemplateFlags(bool status)
00226 {
00227    m_bMouseInTemplateRegion = status;
00228    m_bMouseAtTemplateTopEdge = status;
00229    m_bMouseAtTemplateBottomEdge = status;
00230    m_bMouseAtTemplateLeftEdge = status;
00231    m_bMouseAtTemplateRightEdge = status;
00232 }
00233 
00234 void ImgLabel::checkTemplateRegions(int mouseX, int mouseY)
00235 {
00236    m_bMouseAtTemplateTopEdge = (mouseY == m_originPoint.y());
00237    m_bMouseAtTemplateBottomEdge = (mouseY == m_finalPoint.y());
00238    m_bMouseAtTemplateLeftEdge = (mouseX == m_originPoint.x());
00239    m_bMouseAtTemplateRightEdge = (mouseX == m_finalPoint.x());
00240 
00241    // Hackish way of changing the mouse cursor when inside the QRubberBand region:
00242    if(((mouseX > m_originPoint.x()) && (mouseY > m_originPoint.y())
00243          && (mouseX < m_finalPoint.x()) && (mouseY < m_finalPoint.y()) )
00244          || // When the region was selected from bottom to top
00245          ((mouseX < m_originPoint.x()) && (mouseY < m_originPoint.y())
00246                && (mouseX > m_finalPoint.x()) && (mouseY > m_finalPoint.y()) )
00247    )
00248       {
00249       this->setCursor(Qt::SizeAllCursor);
00250       m_bMouseInTemplateRegion = true;
00251       }
00252    // Change the cursor at the edges:
00253    else if(m_bMouseAtTemplateLeftEdge || m_bMouseAtTemplateRightEdge )
00254       {
00255       this->setCursor(Qt::SizeHorCursor);
00256       m_bMouseInTemplateRegion = false;
00257       }
00258    else if(m_bMouseAtTemplateTopEdge || m_bMouseAtTemplateBottomEdge )
00259       {
00260       this->setCursor(Qt::SizeVerCursor);
00261       m_bMouseInTemplateRegion = false;
00262       }
00263    else
00264       {
00265       this->setCursor(Qt::CrossCursor);
00266       setTemplateFlags(false);
00267       }
00268 }
00269 
00270 void ImgLabel::displayCoordinatesOnStatusLabel(QPoint &point0, QPoint &point1)
00271 {
00272    m_parentWindow->m_status_label->setText(
00273                   "Template: (" + QString::number(point0.x()) + ", " +
00274                   QString::number(point0.y()) + ")px " + "<b> to </b>" +
00275                   " (" + QString::number(point1.x()) + ", " + QString::number(point1.y()) + ")px");
00276 }
